The members of the [[Sound Four]] stand at four directions around their target as they, in unison, perform this technique. They create a dark, dense fog high in the air that descends on the target, engulfing them and creating a powerful [[barrier]] that [[seal]]s them off from all outside forces, even death. The Sound Four use this technique to counter the effects of the [[Mind Awakening Pill]],<ref name="d2"/> which kills those who ingest it in order to advance their [[Orochimaru's Juinjutsu|cursed seal]] to its second level.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 184</ref> The [[Dark Sealing Method]] can be used to contain the fog within a confined space, such as a coffin.<ref>''[[Tō no Sho]]'', page 267</ref>
